Html: Hi! is there a way to fill and extend menus? thanks!

I use an IEventAggregator coupled with List<MenuItem> on the mainviewmodel for the Shell and from there I fired the event from the modules that need to register menuitem(s).  To order the menu contents correctly I use the Tag property and populate it with an Integer value for sorting purposes.

If you need a code example I can post that on request.

 

Morgan.

Morgan,
Is it still possible for you, or anyone else reading, to post some sample code that can do this?

Thank you.
